name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.restore
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.restore() method of the Canvas 2D API restores the most recently saved canvas state by popping the top entry in the drawing state stack. If there is no saved state, this method does nothing.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.restore' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
